title: Covid-19 Vaccines Facts: Get The Real Facts About The Covid-19 Approved Vaccines (Paperback)
author: John Philips
description: The COVID-19 remains a global problem that has affected humanity and change how we live and interact with others.
cleaned_text: The COVID-19 remains a global problem that has affected humanity and change how we live and interact with others. It has rudely change socio-economic, religious and political dynamics of every country in the world, leaving on its trail, severe disruptions and downturns that the world may not recover from any time soon. Multi-billion dollars have been invested into developing COVID-19 vaccine as a solution to the problem by big pharmaceutical companies most notably Pfizer and Moderna and has already produce vaccines that has been approved by FDA and British government. This book "Covid-19 Vaccines Facts" contain what you should know about Pfizer and Moderna vaccines. What you will learn from this book "Covid-19 Vaccines Facts" Click the BUY NOW button to get a copy right away...
